title: Unable to access old account
body:
Hey, I have an account that I'm unable to access as I haven't played for a few months now. It's Sythine on OCE and I'm not sure which of my emails the account is associated with. There's one email account that I think it might be associated with that I've since lost the ability to access. 

Just wondering if there's any way I can find the email associated with the account (even just the first few characters and host) or get my account back. I'd leveled it quite a bit and it's pretty upsetting that I no longer have access to it. I've pretty much got a plethora of ways to prove that it's my account besides the email it's associated with or the password. 

Otherwise I'm just going to keep having to guess the password :\

EDIT: actually I think I just forgot the username, I should know the password to it. 

EDIT2: Also just filed a ticket

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you've already submitted a support ticket (Which it sounds like you have) you'll have to wait for a reply from them and begin the account recovery process afaik.

As this is an account related issue we here on the boards aren't able to help you.
